name: bar-assistant
description: Bar Assistant is a self-hosted cocktail recipe and inventory management app designed for professional bartenders or enthusiasts. It lets users track available ingredients, manage recipes, and plan menus through a mobile-friendly UI.
features: Cocktail Recipes: Manage extensive cocktail recipe database. Complete mixology library.
Inventory Tracking: Track available ingredients and stock levels. Know what you have.
Recipe Suggestions: Find cocktails based on available ingredients. Smart recommendations.
Menu Planning: Plan cocktail menus for events. Professional preparation.
Mobile-Friendly: Responsive interface works on all devices. Mix anywhere.
Bartender Tools: Professional features for bartenders and enthusiasts. Expert-level.
Ingredient Database: Comprehensive ingredient catalog. Complete reference.
Self-Hosted: Keep your recipe collection private. Complete control.
